articles.title: Speech Speed May Indicate Aging Brain Health - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study found that the speed of speech, rather than the difficulty in finding words, is a more accurate indicator of brain health in older adults.

articles.title: “Eat Whatever Rice You Enjoy”: Dietician Debunks 16 Toxic Nutrition Myths That Just Aren't True - Bored Panda
articles.description: Dietician's TikTok video went viral, currently holding over 2.7 million views. In it, she debunks toxic food myths that were made without any scientific evidence.
